page.title: 13Tourism
page.content: The season is late June, July, August and early September. In Aboyne village there are four hotels offering a total of 90 bedrooms of which 39% have bath or shower. In addition there are a few houses offering Bed-and-breakfast accomodation. The attractions of the area are mainly of an outdoor nature, with Nature Reserve, Castles, Visitor Information Centres, Walking, Gliding, Fishing, Golf high in the interests list. The Community School facilities which are open to the Public are an added attraction, especially the Swimming Pool and Games Hall facilities in wet weather.
